Text.Page:
Do you want to possess a heart of darkness?

If you bring me Onyx Sheets between 24th and 29th September, I’ll give you proud Ebonwings in return. Once you tame each of the 5 species, you’ll receive the title Ebonheart.

Onyx Sheets aren’t easy to make, but they’re essential to my work. I can happily give up a few Ebonwings in return. I have more than enough dragons to fire my forge.
